attributes.action: Hold student finance accountable for unreasonable stress and inadequacy.
attributes.background: Year after year student finance fail to meet the basic expectations of providing a renewable financial system for student loans. Without any alternative I have lost count of the number of students who are put under severe emotional stress as a result. It is time they were held to account.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to hold Student Finance to account.
